attributes.action: compulsory lessons of awareness towards motorcyclists for all car drivers
attributes.additional_details:
I want compulsory awareness lessons for all car drivers towards motorcyclists.

After being the wife of someone who has been involved in an accident as a result of not taking a second look at a junction before pulling out, being made aware of how a small split second decision can change someone's life is important to me.

A basic course of awareness similar to the speed awareness courses would be benificial in demonstrating how your actions can affect a motorcyclists.

I want the statistics of biker fatality rates to change. Now.
